cho_description:
Fragment of a clay tablet, 24 lines of inscription. Neo-Assyrian.

COL: [K.8008](http://www.britishmuseum.org/research/collection_online/collection_object_details.aspx?partId=1&objectId=306370)

Length: 7.62 centimetres
Width: 10.79 centimetres

Made from 171 images taken with a Nikon D5100 by Terhi Nurmikko-Fuller, assembled by Daniel Pett in Photoscan.
